data.name: Unplugged: Air Guitar
data.description:
*Now fully playable with controllers or hand-tracking*

Unplugged lets you rock out to some of the biggest and most insanely cool songs from world-famous rock bands, including The Offspring, Weezer & Ozzy Osbourne, using just your hands. Become a rock legend with Steel Panther’s inimitable frontman Satchel as your mentor.

Produced by the lead guitarist of Guitar Hero and fully powered by hand-tracking, playing air guitar has never felt this real. Pick up your virtual guitar, select a song, match your fingers to the chords, strum the strings at the right time and engage the crowd! Unlock songs, venues, guitars, and more on your way to rock stardom and compete with the world’s best air guitarists on the leaderboards.

• Go on an epic journey celebrating 5 decades of rock
• Unlock venues, songs, and gear on your rise to fame
• Jam out to 50+ rock hits in 4 difficulty levels and improve your riffs in practice mode
• Become a rock legend on the global leaderboards
• Choose to play the entire game using just your hands, or pick up your controllers

changelog.change_log:
- Passthrough framerate optimization
- Vibrato notes scoring the same in all difficulties fixed
- Broom achievement not always triggered fixed
- Information pop up panel showing to all users instead of filtered ones fixed
- Pull offs triggering a lot of "Awesome" words while performing vibratos on them fixed

Update 1 - 1.0.304 - November 2021 - You sing, we listen.

A lot of players pointed out that the Album unlocking was way too hard. Many of them also said that they’d preferred to have all the songs unlocked from the beginning because they wanted to enjoy their favourite songs right away. After thinking about what could be the best to address this feedback we decided to change the way we use the in-game challenges. From this new update on, we won’t hold any music content from the user. You will be able to play any song in the set list from minute 1. However, in order to grow as a rockstar and play in bigger and better audiences you will still have to complete a few challenges per album. We hope this decision will help you enjoy the game to the fullest and be the rockstar you always wanted to be.

Patch notes:

- All songs are unlocked at start.
- Venue selector: now players can select the venue they want to play on.
- Players will unlock venues when they complete album challenges. 
- Album challenges redesigned according to user feedback.
- Difficulty balanced according to user feedback. It’s harder to die in easier levels.
- Improved upstrumming: Now is easier to upstrum.
- Reduced the percentage of success notes played to achieve a golden record.
- Balanced guitar Fans price.
- Volume raised in some songs.
- Minor bug fixes.
